title: Extensis Suitcase Fusion Font Management on EBAY!!!
content:
Hello Typophile amigos,

I have an Extensis Suitcase Fusion Font Management Item number: 32014908987 going really cheap on E-Bay . When I returned from Typecon I found one of my partners had purchased it for me as a welcome back gift. Bid on it if you like. I would rather have one of my fellow Typophiles get it. Ciao, Checko √o

 [‹ Lower case numbers in san serif anyone?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202193044/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36460 "Go to previous forum topic") [New Globe and Mail today ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202193044/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33247 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Checko Salgado
